translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Reversal of the Order of the Terms in the Law

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)🔽19.7. Pītittika🔽Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.🔽Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.🔽Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  pītittika  na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cattāri  na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cattāri  na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Section on the Triad🔽With joy

original: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā cattāri 🔽hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa pe avigate aṭṭhavīsa
